promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong dragon fighting-type pokemon with a rocky tail. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Terragona, a a gigantic strong dragon fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Cross Chop, Pit Trap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "fighting" or "Terragona". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, dragon-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: The enormous Terragona rules canyon realms with unmatched strength. It prefers solitude, using Cross Chop and Pit Trap to ward off intruders.
